title: Looking for an N172 Old Judge Horning (Hornung)

posts.post_title: Looking for an N172 Old Judge Horning (Hornung)
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Tony Andrea
Looking to buy an N172 Old Judge of Joe Horning (Hornung).
Condition on the back isn't important, but would like an 
example with a nice dark image on the front. 
If anyone has one they would like to sell, please send me 
a scan and the price you desire. Thank you, Tony

andreatny@qwest.net
